meanings.definition: The bones of the hip or haunch.
meanings.sent1: She felt a sharp pain in her aitchbones after the long hike.
meanings.sent2: The doctor pointed to the aitchbones on the X-ray.
meanings.sent3: Carrying all those books made her aitchbones ache.
meanings.sent4: The old chair creaked under his weight, as if its aitchbones were protesting.
meanings.sent5: The dancer moved gracefully, emphasizing her aitchbones with each step.

meanings.definition: A joint of the hip or haunch.
meanings.sent1: His aitchbones popped as he stood up from the chair.
meanings.sent2: The aitchbones of the robot allowed it to move smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The squeaky door sounded like it needed some oil on its aitchbones.
meanings.sent4: The car's suspension worked like a well-oiled set of aitchbones.
meanings.sent5: The mechanic carefully examined the aitchbones of the machine to ensure proper function.
